body_html:
It's not all, afaik.

Hey Soumith, all the initialisers in the link(https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/dc0faab18dd5296b66dfb00776253062def87fdf/torch/nn/init.py) seem to use the torch.no_grad method before returning. Please correct me if I'm wrong. Thank you!
body_text:
It's not all, afaik.

Hey Soumith, all the initialisers in the link(https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/dc0faab18dd5296b66dfb00776253062def87fdf/torch/nn/init.py) seem to use the torch.no_grad method before returning. Please correct me if I'm wrong. Thank you!
body:
> It's not all, afaik.
 
Hey Soumith, all the initialisers in the link(https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/dc0faab18dd5296b66dfb00776253062def87fdf/torch/nn/init.py) seem to use the torch.no_grad method before returning. Please correct me if I'm wrong. Thank you!
